name: Another Sight
summary: A teenager who has lost her sight and a mysterious cat team up in a surreal fantasy adventure into the unexpected, weaving a tale that brings together some of the world’s greatest minds: Monet, Tesla, Edison and other historical cultural icons.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018年9月7日
  • 开发: Lunar Great Wall Studios
  • 发行: Fish Eagle
